# üêû Bug Report

### Description

getStateV2 (`/eth/v2/debug/beacon/states/{state_id}`) beacon API returns invalid json data. The ssz response is correct but looks like only for finalized states.

It looks like `historical_roots` are incorrect, see https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/5737#issuecomment-1630655103.

For more context: https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/5737

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Haven't tested this on older releases

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

```js
import { toHexString } from "@chainsafe/ssz";
import { getClient, ApiError } from "@lodestar/api";
import { config } from "@lodestar/config/default";
import { ssz } from "@lodestar/types";

const api = getClient({ baseUrl: "http://localhost:9596" }, { config });
const slot = process.argv[2];

const blockRes = await api.beacon.getBlockV2(slot);
ApiError.assert(blockRes);

const blockStateRoot = toHexString(blockRes.response.data.message.stateRoot);
console.log("BeaconBlock stateRoot:    ", blockStateRoot);

const stateRes = await api.debug.getStateV2(slot);
ApiError.assert(stateRes);

const stateRoot = toHexString(ssz.capella.BeaconState.hashTreeRoot(stateRes.response.data));
console.log("BeaconState hashTreeRoot: ", stateRoot);

console.assert(stateRoot === blockStateRoot);
```
